name: elunitcn
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))

|- wi(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cr))

|- wi(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))

comment: The closed unit interval is a subset of the set of the complext numbers. Useful lemma for manipulating probabilities within the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Dec-2016.)
